This specification is not final and is subject to change.
For OGC standard, see GeoAPI 3.0.2.

Module org.opengis.geoapi.conformance

Package org.opengis.geoapi

package org.opengis.geoapi
Information about GeoAPI content, made available for test suites. The information are either hard-coded (e.g. list of all interfaces) or read from OGC XML schema.
Since:
3.1
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.opengis.geoapi.schema
    Tools for comparing Java API against XML schema.
